item.title: 周五莫斯科音乐会场馆发生恐怖袭击，造成至少 137 人死亡，两名嫌疑人已认罪，俄罗斯总统普京对所谓袭击者的动机提出质疑。

item.title: "副警长走到大厅门口，"该部门说。"这时，这名少年冲进大厅，伸手夺走了副警长的枪套，并将其占为己有：

item.title: 周一，俄罗斯在五天内第三次向基辅发射导弹，这是克里姆林宫军队对乌克兰城市的空中轰炸明显升级的一部分，战争已进入第三年，前线基本处于静止状态。
item.description:
Russia launched missiles against Kyiv for the third time in five days Monday, part of an apparent escalation of aerial bombardment of Ukrainian cities by the Kremlin’s forces as the war stretches into its third year with the front line largely stationary. https://t.co/m09vzkysc4

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 这是数百名咖啡馆服务员在巴黎历史性比赛中断 13 年后再次参赛的规则。

item.title: 如果特朗普及其成年儿子无法为其民事欺诈案中的 4.64 亿美元判决付款或获得保释金，纽约州总检察长莱蒂西亚-詹姆斯（Letitia James）可能会开始查封这位前总统的珍贵资产：
item.description:
If Trump and his adult sons are unable to pay or secure a bond for the $464 million judgment in his civil fraud case, New York Attorney General Letitia James could begin the process of seizing the former president's prized assets.

Read more: https://t.co/OMyENwX6WI pic.twitter.com/YUB4mVvc1E

item.title: 拜登总统在上周的多日行程中访问了五个城市，而前总统特朗普几乎没有公开露面，大部分时间都待在南佛罗里达州。

item.title: 一位中国牧师发现，即使出狱后，他也不能完全自由，他买不到火车票，甚至不能去医院看医生。
item.description:
Unable to buy a train ticket, or even see a doctor at a hospital, a Chinese pastor found that even after his release from prison, he is not quite free. https://t.co/uHxDJDwzuY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 白宫周日抨击国会共和党人在政府拨款法案中加入一项条款，该条款实质上阻止了美国大使馆上空悬挂 LGBTQ+ 自豪旗帜，并誓言要废除该条款。
item.description:
The White House on Sunday slammed Congressional Republicans for including a provision in the government funding bill that essentially stops LGBTQ+ Pride flags from being flown over U.S. embassies and vowed to repeal it.https://t.co/HuYO4HHPqs pic.twitter.com/vdlVDawv7S

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 快餐连锁店 Chick-Fil-A背弃了其十年前做出的 "绝不使用抗生素 "的承诺，该承诺旨在帮助防止人类因畜牧生产中大量使用抗生素而产生抗药性。
item.description:
The fast-food chain Chick-Fil-A backtracked from its decade-old “no antibiotics ever” pledge intended to help prevent human antibiotic resistance linked to the rampant use of the drugs in livestock production.https://t.co/h6QAjiMjJB pic.twitter.com/9l9BicXVAs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 在堪萨斯州加登城的 83 号公路上，强风暴席卷了整个地区，狂风卷着碎石飞向迎面而来的车辆。
item.description:
Intense winds sent debris flying toward oncoming traffic on Highway 83 in Garden City, Kansas, as severe storms moved through the region. pic.twitter.com/kdJnunm2Ur

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 无论是亲戚还是朋友，美联航现在都允许其前程万里（MileagePlus）会员使用一项新功能，在一个联名账户中最多可有五人贡献和合并里程。
item.description:
Whether it's relatives or friends, United now allows its MileagePlus members to access a new feature to contribute and combine miles into one joint account with up to five people. https://t.co/orKU6Qwbsx

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 太空天气预报员发布了将持续到下周一的地磁暴警报，称太阳耀斑喷发出的等离子体可能会干扰地球上的无线电传输。不过，这也可能成为观赏极光的绝佳机会。
item.description:
Space weather forecasters have issued a geomagnetic storm watch through Monday, saying an ouburst of plasma from a solar flare could interfere with radio transmissions on Earth. It could also make for great aurora viewing.https://t.co/KSzN9nvyd7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024

item.title: 据佐治亚州调查局称，本周早些时候，两名少年在从法庭案件押送至佐治亚州奥古斯塔市青少年拘留中心的途中从警方手中逃脱，他们被指控犯有严重伤害罪。

item.title: 当 @rachelvscott 问及如果以色列不顾反对按计划入侵拉法追捕哈马斯战士，"美国是否会承担后果 "时，副总统哈里斯说："我不排除任何可能性。
item.description:
When pressed by @rachelvscott on whether there will be “consequences from the United States” if Israel moves forward with a planned invasion of Rafah in pursuit of Hamas fighters despite opposition, Vice Pres. Harris says, “I am ruling out nothing.” https://t.co/Qs7rvEXueM pic.twitter.com/2FBNS7I0DK

— ABC News (@ABC) March 25, 2024
